sqlMap.select: SELECT siss.TEST_ROSTER_ID as testRosterId, siss.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, siss.COMPLETION_STATUS as completionStatus, siss.START_DATE_TIME as startDateTime, siss.COMPLETION_DATE_TIME as completionDateTime, siss.VALIDATION_STATUS as validationStatus, siss.VALIDATION_UPDATED_BY as validationUpdatedBy, siss.VALIDATION_UPDATED_DATE_TIME as validationUpdatedDateTime, siss.VALIDATION_UPDATED_NOTE as validationUpdatedNote, siss.TIME_EXPIRED as timeExpired FROM STUDENT_ITEM_SET_STATUS siss, ITEM_SET iset, test_roster tr, test_admin adm, product prod WHERE iset.item_set_id = siss.item_set_id and iset.sample = 'F' and siss.TEST_ROSTER_ID = #testRosterId:NUMERIC# and tr.test_roster_id = siss.test_roster_id and adm.test_Admin_id = tr.test_Admin_id and prod.product_id = adm.product_id AND (iset.item_set_level != 'L' OR PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'TL')

SELECT siss.VALIDATION_STATUS as validationStatus, siss.EXEMPTIONS as exemptions, siss.ABSENT as absent FROM STUDENT_ITEM_SET_STATUS siss WHERE siss.item_set_id = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# and siss.TEST_ROSTER_ID = #testRosterId:NUMERIC#
